addonManifest.name: Microsoft SQL Server
addonManifest.description: Provides Microsoft SQL databases scoped to a development team.
addonManifest.deploymentNotes: This add-on assumes that you already have a Microsoft SQL Server instance running, configured with authentication, and one admin user. The admin username and password are needed to create client databases.
addonManifest.author: P. van Dorp

property.description: The server name of a Microsoft SQL Server instance.
The server port of a Microsoft SQL Server instance.
The master database of a Microsoft SQL Server instance.
The username of a Microsoft SQL Server administrator.
The password of a Microsoft SQL Server administrator.
